import React from 'react' import '../style/home.css' import { Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap'; import heroImg from '../assets/images/hero-img01.jpg' import Subtitle from './../Shared/Subtitle'; const Home = () => { return <> {/* hero-section-right start */}

Our HR Services

We are a team of professionals and subject matter experts with over three decades of experience in HR Consulting, Training, Outsourcing, Executive Search, Recruitments, Temporary Staffing services in various sectors and verticals.

{/* hero-section-right end */} {/* hero-section-left start */}

Welcome to
Pasona Group

Pasona Group is the parent company of Pasona India Pvt Ltd. As Japan’s leading human resources management company, Pasona Group has its presence across the globe.
Pasona India, India's first Japanese HR solutions agency, was established in 2006. With a team of experienced advisors, knowledgeable and updated about the latest policies in the HR industry, Pasona India has risen to become one of the most sought after HR solutions organization in the country today.

{/* hero-section-left end */} {/* services start */}
OUR SERVICES

What We Do?
{/* services end */} } export default Home
